name: Elite Rusher
description:
« Elite Rusher » is an Action / Shooter / Survival game with pixel art graphism.

You control a character that need to protect his house and survive to many wave of mobs knowing that every 10 seconds, an elite mob will spawn.

How many time you will survive ? ... Or will you perish ?

-------------------------------------------------------------

This game have been made in 72h. I worked alone on everything. The project has started using my own engine I prepared before.

The game is better designed to be played using a gamepad:

Controls (Gamepad):

  • Aim: Right stick
  • Movements: Left stick
  • Fire: RT (Right Trigger)

Controls (Mouse/Keyboard):

  • Aim: Mouse cursor
  • Movements: ZQSD/Arrows
  • Fire: Mouse left button

------------------------------------------------------------

This part will help you understand mechanics of the game. You can avoid it if you want to discover the game by yourself.

  • There is a total of 50 waves with increasing diffculty.
  • A wave is finished when a certain amount of mobs are killed.
  • The player win experience by killing mobs.
  • There is a total of 30 levels.
  • Each level up of the player make him stronger (he wins alternatively an improved rate of fire, a better range of his weapon and a gain of movements speed)
  • Each 10 seconds, an elite mob appear
  • From the wave 5, the elite mob becomes stronger (more health and he can fire on the player)
  • From the wave 10, the elite mob becomes even stronger (more health, better speed)
  • From the wave 10, the house gets a health regeneration every 10 seconds
  • During each waves, undeads mobs appears faster and becomes more resistants.
Will you survive? Let's play Elite Rusher to know it!

Greetings,

Akadream.
